tool_description: All the latest NFT news from around the world.
name: NFT Global
title: NFT Global

api_list.name: Get All NFT News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the latest news about NFT's from all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nft-global.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nft-global.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nft-global.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nft-global.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
